lines.text: The <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> had to have tattoos on his back...
Maybe... the <c=#FF6000>Reversing Rune</c> pattern was hidden in them, and...
He just sort of took the bullet, but because he counted as a sticker...
If it were that easy t'make yourself bulletproof, I figure more crooks would do it.
There's a lot of things that are easy with magic that people don't do!
Yeah, and when we shoot people for doin' em, it usually works just fine.
